Title: Tarantella
Plot: Nick and Hank find themselves on the hunt for a deadly heartbreaker leaving behind a web of dead bodies. Meanwhile, Nick?s growing recognition among the creature world is starting to threaten not only his safety but Juliette?s as well, and it may be time for him to take action to keep her safe.
GuestStars: Amy Acker, Nicholas Gonzalez, Sharon Sachs, Robert Blanche, Danny Bruno
